main.name: Vivek Malhan
main.description: The Full Stack Developer, part-time RJ, Blogger, and YouTuber extraordinaire!,
main.intro: Hey there, I'm Vivek - a Full Stack Developer at Publicis Sapient, part-time RJ, and YouTuber. I'm passionate about technology, music, and sharing knowledge with others.
main.more: At Publicis Sapient, I get to work on challenging projects that allow me to think creatively and come up with innovative solutions. On the side, I share my love for music as a part-time RJ at a popular local radio station, and I create tutorials and guides on my YouTube channel and my medium blog to help others improve their programming skills.
